document.full_text: as the flooding on the mississippi river rolls downstream, the rising waters are flushing a number of animals out of their natural habitats and into uncomfortably close contact with people.
document.title: floodwaters push reptiles, other critters into the open
lines_and_colors: as the flooding on the mississippi river rolls downstream, the rising waters are flushing a number of animals out of their natural habitats and into uncomfortably close contact with people.
